metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Fugitive Air is significantly more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: Fugitive Air has sections analyzed in the following keys: E Mixolydian, B Mixolydian,  and C Major.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
